alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:58PM EDT until August 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Madison County in central New York... Northeastern Cortland County in central New York... Northwestern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 557 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Solon, or 11 miles east of Cortland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eaton, Hamilton, Morrisville, Nelson, Lebanon, Otselic, Cuyler, Georgetown, Deruyter and Lincklaen. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central New York. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
